content: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: All the world is a stage, And all the men and women merely players. They have their exits and entrances; Each man in his time plays many parts.
author: William Shakespeare

content: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
author: Wayne Dyer

content: Focusing your life solely on making a buck shows a poverty of ambition. It asks too little of yourself. And it will leave you unfulfilled.
author: Barack Obama

content: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: Seneca the Younger

content: Kindness is the golden chain by which society is bound together.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

content: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
author: Epictetus

content: Accept the things to which fate binds you and love the people with whom fate brings you together but do so with all your heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

content: Excellence is to do a common thing in an uncommon way.
author: Booker T. Washington

content: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

content: The winner ain't the one with the fastest car it's the one who refuses to lose.
author: Dale Earnhardt

content: And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same.
author: Nelson Mandela

content: To be great is to be misunderstood.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
author: William Burroughs

content: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

content: If you want things to be different, perhaps the answer is to become different yourself.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

content: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
author: George Eliot

content: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
author: Muhammad Ali

content: Everything that happens as it should, and if you observe carefully, you will find this to be so.
author: Marcus Aurelius

content: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
author: Laozi

content: When you doubt your power, you give power to your doubt.
author: Honoré de Balzac

content: First we thought the PC was a calculator. Then we found out how to turn numbers into letters with ASCII — and we thought it was a typewriter. Then we discovered graphics, and we thought it was a television. With the World Wide Web, we've realized it's a brochure.
author: Douglas Adams

content: I gave my life to become the person I am right now. Was it worth it?
author: Richard Bach
Amy Poehler
content: There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
author: Stephen Hawking

content: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: Satchel Paige

content: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou

content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

content: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
author: Marie Curie

content: When in doubt, don't.
author: Benjamin Franklin
